p: The MFT of each location was obtained by calculating the mode of daily mean temperature distributed in the 54 thâ€“92 th range during the entire year, which is the 95% distribution of the MMPs. We systematically analysed the distribution of the MMTs, annual mean temperature, 78 th percentile temperature and MFTs in 420 locations from 30 countries. We compared the two existing indicators (annual mean temperature and 78 th percentile temperature) and the new indicator (MFT).
